_header: A softness of a sovereign to subjects he hath I-showed
_description: Alliterative verse in an English prose homily — three lines, each followed by refrain, ‘in þat a haþ sent from heuene & deliuerid / þus tanne i seie he haþ deliuerid’

WorcF10.Transcription:
A softenes of a soueryn to sogectes a haþ e schewid in þat
                    ahaþ i sent……but sikemen from hir sornes suerliche a
                    haþ e sauidin þat a haþ sent from heuene & deliuerid
                    þus tanne i seie he haþ deliuerid
WorcF10.Editions:
Grisdale,  D. M. 
             Three Middle English Sermons from the Worcester Chapter Manuscript
                F.10.
Leeds Texts & Monographs
         5. Kendal: T. Wilson, 1939: 42.
